item.title: Famitsu Sales: 11/18/24 – 11/24/24
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/famitsu-sales-11-18-24-11-24-24

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake sells an additional 91,362 retail copies.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the week of November 18, 2024 to November 24, 2024.

Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake remained the top selling game following its debut the previous week, moving 70,993 units for Switch and 20,369 units for PlayStation 5, for an additional 91,362 retail sales.

On the hardware side, the Switch family sold 69,135 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 25,573 units, the Xbox Series family sold 2,657 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 34 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [NSW] Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 11/14/24) – 70,993 (712,188)
  2. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) – 34,014 (476,607)
  3. [PS5] Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 11/14/24) – 20,369 (200,944)
  4. [NSW] Mario & Luigi: Brothership (Nintendo, 11/07/24) – 9,920 (88,529)
  5. [NSW] Disney Music Parade: Encore (Imagineer, 11/21/24) – 9,260 (New)
  6. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) – 9,001 (6,064,932)
  7. [NSW] STRAY (Happinet, 11/21/24) – 7,779 (New)
  8. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu wa Kibou de Mawatteru! (Konami, 11/16/23) – 7,482 (1,161,525)
  9. [NSW] Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics (Capcom, 11/21/24) – 5,749 (New)
  10. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 5,706 (3,682,045)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on November 29.

  1. [PS4] Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics (Capcom, 11/21/24) – (New)
  2. [NSW] SHINJUKU SOUMEI (G-MODE Corporation, 11/21/24) – (New)
  3. [PS4] SNK vs. Capcom: SVC CHAOS (SNK, 11/21/24) – (New)
  4. [NSW] SNK vs. Capcom: SVC CHAOS (SNK, 11/21/24) – (New)
  5. [NSW] Beyblade X: XONE (FuRyu, 11/14/24) –
  6. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) –
  7. [NSW] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) –
  8. [NSW] Luigi’s Mansion 3 (Nintendo, 10/31/19) –
  9. [NSW] Suika Game Special Edition (Aladdin X, 11/14/24) –
  10. [NSW] The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom (Nintendo, 09/26/24) –
  11. [NSW] Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Nintendo, 12/07/18) –
  12. [NSW] Super Mario Odyssey (Nintendo, 10/27/17) –
  13. [PS5] Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Activision, 10/25/24) –
  14. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) –
  15. [PS5] Professional Baseball Spirits 2024-2025 (Konami, 10/17/24) –
  16. [PS5] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) –
  17. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  18. [NSW] Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025 (Konami, 07/18/24) –
  19. [NSW] Ring Fit Adventure (Nintendo, 10/18/19) –
  20. [PS5] Silent Hill 2 (Konami, 10/08/24) –
  21. [NSW] The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (Nintendo, 03/03/17) –
  22. [PS4] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) –
  23. [NSW] Super Mario Bros. Wonder (Nintendo, 10/20/23) –
  24. [NSW] Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythmic Festival (Bandai Namco, 09/22/22) –
  25. [NSW] Splatoon 3 (Nintendo, 09/09/22) –
  26. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu: Showa, Heisei, Reiwa mo Teiban! (Konami, 11/19/20) –
  27. [NSW] Pikmin 4 (Nintendo, 07/21/23) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. Switch OLED Model – 48,373 (8,261,305)
  2. Switch Lite – 14,432 (6,232,233)
  3. PlayStation 5 Pro – 10,128 (102,092)
  4. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 9,346 (877,915)
  5. Switch – 6,330 (19,950,011)
  6. PlayStation 5 – 6,099 (5,277,120)
  7. Xbox Series X Digital Edition – 1,132 (9,081)
  8. Xbox Series S – 769 (324,866)
  9. Xbox Series X – 756 (309,949)
  10. PlayStation 4 – 34 (7,928,827)
